DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to study the HIV disease progression in HIV-infected Thai Adult.
DOC.detailed_description: This is a multicenter, observational prospective cohort study. All HIV-infected patients from Bamrasnaradura Institute, Sanpatong Hospital and HIV-NAT, Thai Red Cross AIDS Research Centre, are followed to assess HIV disease progression.
